hero.subtitle: My Work
hero.heading: Projects that blend systems thinking with user empathy
hero.lead: From embedded telemetry to full-stack platforms, each project reflects a commitment to craft, collaboration, and outcomes that matter.

cta.subtitle: Bring your idea to life
cta.heading: Looking for an engineer who cares about outcomes and craft?
cta.description: Let's co-design a roadmap, co-create experiments, and deliver products your users remember. Happy to plug into existing teams or stand up new initiatives.
